* The global men's grooming market is projected to reach $166 billion by 2022. Nero aims to capture a significant share of this growing market.

Slide 4: Product and differentiation

* Our products are differentiated from competitors by their specific formulation for men's skin and their uncomplicated use.

Slide 5: Target Market

* Nero's target market is men between 25 and 45 years old who are conscious of their appearance and want to look and feel their best, but don't have the time or knowledge for time-consuming skincare routines.
